about_the_game:
About this game and why we make this game:
GUN BLADE is a VR Shooting Game. It's a simple, funny and classic shooting game. We think all of you remember when you were child, playing a shooting was the most exciting and funny time. So, in order to bring back that feeling, we decide to make this shooting game but just in VR, as we think that VR becomes more and more popular.
=========================

Weapon Feature:
The weapon GUN BLADE could be shift between Gun and Blade, some enemies could only be killed by Blade.

=========================
The GUN BLADE world:
In GUN BLADE, the player act as a network mercenary and your mission is to destroy the system virus. All the virus clone from the original virus which named "DONKEY", in each boss stage, the boss it is that the DONKEY with different skills and equipments. Players use their GUN BLADE and shield to fight with virus and finally found out the truth of the world. As GUN BLADE is just a shooting action focused game, we won't put too much in story but we plan to tell players some interesting settings of the game world.

========================

Let's play and give us some suggestion to make GUN BLADE more funny and exciting.
